name: dslink-java-v2-webscrape
description: POC for a web scraping DSLink

main-node.help: Class name of the main node.

log.help: all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, off

msgpack.help: Whether or not to use msgpack.  False is helpful for debugging.

log-file.help: Only set when the link is being run standalone

key.help: Public/private key pair used by the link.

nodes.help: Path to the node configuration database file.
